name: Florifer
storyline:
You play as a nameless creature who awakens in a silent, abandoned world. The ancient architectures of past civilizations are now covered with flourishing vegetation but, amongst all the green, flowers are completely missing.
Only a handful of magical seeds, scattered around the world, can grow into flowers and bring this long forgotten land back to life: the nameless creature shall find the seeds, grow them inside the artifact called Pothorn, a horn-shaped vase that can be carried as a rucksack, and restore the natural balance.
summary: Open world explorative game focused on growing the last magical seeds that can turn into flowers and bring an abandoned, silent world back to life.
